Title: Login Error
Description: Issue observed: Error when user logs in with valid credentials; Steps to reproduce: Enter valid credentials and click login; Expected result: User is logged in successfully.

Title: Dashboard Not Loading
Description: Issue observed: Dashboard page remains blank; Steps to reproduce: Login and navigate to dashboard; Expected result: Dashboard displays user data.

Title: Incorrect Error Message
